name: The 12:17 Fairway Express
description:
A submission for the GMTK Game Jam.

On what should have been a simple adventure for treasure, you and your companion Chip find yourselves onboard a runaway train, hijacked by a mysterious treasure-hunting rival. The two of you must move fast in order to survive!

This is a linear Twine story with some visual elements. About 3-5 minutes long.  I was hoping to include more visuals and add a little more polish, but time constraints in a game jam always hold you back.

In any case, I'm very happy with the result of my work this weekend. I hope you enjoy. Please feel free to leave feedback!
